summary: Comprehensive analysis of himalaya module revealing critical UX gaps: no way to open emails (only ephemeral preview), broken selection toggle despite always-visible checkboxes, and incomplete keybindings. Recommended mutt-style workflow with proper email reading, selection system fix, and consistent keybindings.

artifacts.summary: Detailed research report documenting module architecture (90+ files), current UX gaps including broken Enter and Space keybindings, himalaya CLI underutilization, and prioritized recommendations for implementation
